## {{< fa basket-shopping >}} Ingredients

- [ ] 1 prepackage of chocolate chip muffins
- [ ] anything the prepackage says you need (e.g., eggs, milk, etc.)
- [ ] 1 can of pears

## {{< fa kitchen-set >}} Procedure

1. Dice the canned pears.
2. Start preparing the muffins as indicated on the package.
3. When putting the dough into the muffin molds, put some diced pears in there. 
4. Put the muffins into the oven and bake as indicated on the package.
5. Et voil√†, now you have pear chocolate chip muffins =  chocolately but also fruity, and most importantly super easy to make!
